home.title: Intelligent News Reading and Management Tool
home.description: News Assistant is a fully offline application that integrates news aggregation and intelligent analysis. It collects content in real-time from four main sections: Political News (including TASS, Sputnik, Xinhua, Associated Press, Politico, Yomiuri Shimbun, Chosun Ilbo, VNA, Washington Post, VOX, Fox News, Global Times, Guancha, BBC, Qiushi Magazine, CCTV News, etc.), Military News (US site The War Zone, UK's Naval News, Guancha Military Section), Financial News, and Social Media (Weibo, X/Twitter, Reddit). Users can subscribe to specific social media accounts. The software integrates a local AI engine (pre-installed with Qianwen model, supports adding custom models from Hugging Face/ModelScope), which can summarize, analyze, verify (planned) and translate content, and provides a chat interface with local models. Supports viewing and commenting on X posts, reading long Weibo posts. The software offers a multilingual interface, all data is stored locally in SQLite, ensuring user privacy. Planned supported platforms include: macOS (Intel/Apple Silicon chips), Windows, Linux, Android, iOS, and HarmonyOS.
home.videos_subtitle: Watch demo videos of News Assistant features
home.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support video playback.

features.title: Powerful Features, Exceptional Experience
features.subtitle: Fully offline intelligent news aggregation and analysis application · 100% data stored on your device · Guarantee of absolute privacy security
features.core_features_subtitle: Integrated news aggregation and analysis solution
features.highlight1_desc: No remote servers, all data processing is done on your device, data never leaves your computer/phone
features.highlight2_desc: Built-in Qianwen model, supports custom AI models from Hugging Face/ModelScope, fully localized AI processing
features.highlight3_desc: SQLite local database, all news, subscriptions, analysis results are stored on your device
features.highlight4_desc: Supports 15+ language interfaces and AI content processing, automatic translation, summarization, analysis of multilingual news
features.news_aggregation_content:
Political News: Real-time updates from global authoritative media
Military News: Professional military media
Financial News: Real-time financial and economic information
Social Media: Weibo, X (Twitter), Reddit
features.ai_processing_content:
Built-in AI Engine: Pre-installed Qianwen model series, supports selecting model version based on device performance, fully local operation, no internet connection required
Extended model support: Supports Hugging Face models, supports ModelScope models, user custom model import
AI processing functions: Intelligent content summarization, multilingual automatic translation, deep analysis and insights, fact verification (planned)
features.social_media_content:
Platform support: Weibo (supports reading long Weibo posts), X/Twitter (supports comment interaction), Reddit
Personalized subscriptions: Custom following of Weibo users, custom following of X accounts, real-time collection of latest posts, intelligent content aggregation
Interactive functions: View X post comment sections, comment on X posts within the app, read complete content of long Weibo posts
features.multilingual_content:
Multilingual support: Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, Urdu, Hindi, Malay, Russian, Portuguese, Thai, Mongolian
Intelligent translation: Automatic detection of content language, mutual translation between 15+ languages, maintaining original text semantic accuracy
AI chat interface: Independent AI chat page, direct dialogue with local models, obtain news analysis and answers, fully offline operation
features.data_flow_subtitle: Data processing from collection to analysis is completed entirely on your device
features.flow_step1_desc: Real-time collection of content from global news sources and social media, data directly saved to local SQLite database
features.flow_step2_desc: All data (news, posts, analysis results) stored in local SQLite database, never transferred to cloud
features.flow_step3_desc: Local AI engine summarizes, translates, and analyzes content, processing results saved back to local database
features.flow_step4_desc: Users view, search, comment on content in local interface, all operations recorded locally
features.data_security_principle: Core principle: All data processed locally on user device, no remote servers, no cloud data transmission
features.data_security_storage: Storage method: SQLite local database file, accessible and manageable directly through software menu
features.data_security_privacy: Privacy commitment: Your reading history, subscription preferences, analysis results, etc. never leave your device
features.platform_ai_subtitle: Covers main platforms, supports diverse AI model selection
features.builtin_model_desc: Pre-installed Qianwen model series, selecting appropriate version based on device performance
features.huggingface_model_desc: Supports downloading and loading models from Hugging Face platform
features.modelscope_model_desc: Supports importing models from ModelScope platform
features.custom_model_desc: Supports users adding local custom model paths
features.model_note: All AI models run on your local device, processing does not rely on network connection
features.technical_subtitle: Technical architecture designed specifically for privacy protection and local processing
features.tech1_desc: Adopts fully local architecture, no reliance on remote servers: All data processing done locally on device, no user data uploads, no cloud account system, network only used for content collection
features.tech2_desc: SQLite local database system: All data stored in single database file, data directory directly accessible through software menu, supports data backup and migration, data completely controlled by user
features.tech3_desc: Optimized for local AI processing: Supports selecting model size based on device performance, intelligent cache management to reduce repeated calculations, supports hardware acceleration (GPU inference), low memory consumption design
features.cta_title: Experience Fully Offline Intelligent News Reading
features.cta_desc: Download News Assistant now, enjoy secure, intelligent, efficient news aggregation and analysis experience on your device
features.cta_note: Serious commitment: Your data always belongs to you, we never collect any user information

download.title: Download News Assistant
download.subtitle: Choose your platform and start using News Assistant
download.choose_platform_desc: News Assistant supports multiple operating systems
